field_provus_body.value:
Contact

The Meridian County Beautification Committee is actively working to serve residents by enhancing the appeal of our communities. Recent activities of the committee includes clean-up and beautification events where volunteers come together to clean public spaces. The committee also provides resources to assist residence beautify their own properties.

Address

407 Apple Lane New City, NJ 40559

General Information

Phone: 788-909-7878

Fax: 788-909-7879
